חדשות המדע https://www.sciencenews.org עיתונאות עצמאית מאז 1921 יום רביעי, 15 בינואר 2025 22:30:16 +0000 en-US מדי שעה 1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.7.1 https://i0.wp.com/www.sciencenews.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/cropped-favicon.jpg?fit=32%2C32&ssl=1 חדשות המדע https://www.sciencenews.org 32 32 165798862
למה צופים מומחי שפעת העופות בשנת 2025 https://www.sciencenews.org/article/bird-flu-avian-flu-h5n1-virusMcKenzie Prillaman Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:00:00 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148566 Since early 2024, the U.S. has logged 66 human cases of H5N1. Scientists are keeping a watchful eye on the virus’s spread as we enter a new year. 3148566
ייתכן שנקברו אבנים עתיקות וחקוקות כדי לזמן את השמש https://www.sciencenews.org/article/ancient-engrave-stones-bury-summon-sunRichard Kemeny Thu, 16 Jan 2025 00:01:00 +0000Archaeology https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148592 Members of a Stone Age culture in Denmark may have ritually buried stones to counter the effects of a volcanic eruption. 3148592
מדוע ה-FDA אסר על צבע המזון הנפוץ אדום מס' 3 https://www.sciencenews.org/article/fda-ban-food-dye-red-no-3Meghan Rosen Wed, 15 Jan 2025 21:50:01 +0000 UncategorizedBriefs https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148628 Evidence that the synthetic dye Red No. 3 is harmful comes from studies in rats, not people. Food companies now have two years to remove it from products. 3148628
הכוח החברתי והפוליטי של נשים קלטיות מתקופת הברזל קיבל דחיפה https://www.sciencenews.org/article/iron-age-celtic-women-power-dnaBruce Bower Wed, 15 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000Genetics https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148587 Ancient DNA indicates women stayed in their home communities and married partners from outside the area. 3148587
ארס נחשים קטלני עשוי להיות מתמודד על ידי חלבונים חדשים שתוכננו בינה מלאכותית https://www.sciencenews.org/article/ai-snake-antivenom-venomMeghan Rosen Wed, 15 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147847 The current way to produce antivenoms is antiquated. Experiments in mice suggest that an artificial intelligence approach could save time and money. 3147847
חיידקים זוללים רעלנים עשויים לחיות על עור צפרדע רעיל https://www.sciencenews.org/article/bacteria-eat-toxin-poison-frog-skinJake Buehler Wed, 15 Jan 2025 14:15:53 +0000Life https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147992 Toxins on poison dart frog skin mold the skin's microbial community, boosting species variety and potentially even feeding some daredevil bacteria. 3147992
סנאים מאכילים ידיים שינו בטעות את הגולגולת שלהם https://www.sciencenews.org/article/hand-feed-red-squirrels-changed-skullsBethany Brookshire Wed, 15 Jan 2025 00:01:00 +0000Animals https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148576 When fed peanuts, red squirrels in Britain developed weaker bites — showing that food supplements to threatened animals could have unintended side effects. 3148576
השמנת יתר זקוקה להגדרה חדשה מעבר ל-BMI, טוענים מומחי בריאות https://www.sciencenews.org/article/obesity-clinical-disease-bmi-healthMcKenzie Prillaman Tue, 14 Jan 2025 23:30:00 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148560 Experts say clinical obesity is more than a high BMI and instead is a disease in which excess body fat harms tissues, organs or doing daily activities. 3148560
פודקאסט מאתגר אותנו להעריך מחדש את מערכת היחסים שלנו עם שריפות https://www.sciencenews.org/article/united-by-fire-podcast-reviewNikk Ogasa Tue, 14 Jan 2025 15:00:00 +0000Environment https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148365 United by Fire lays out key insights from the two largest blazes in Colorado history, the Cameron Peak and East Troublesome fires of 2020. 3148365
התקררת? פלצבו עשוי לעזור https://www.sciencenews.org/article/placebo-cold-medicine-decongestantLaura Sanders Tue, 14 Jan 2025 13:00:00 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148157 Amid doubts over a common decongestant, evidence suggests the placebo effect can still help people suffering from a cold. 3148157
איך נוכל למצוא סוף סוף חורים שחורים מהשחר הקוסמי https://www.sciencenews.org/article/primordial-black-holes-cosmic-dawnElizabeth Quill Mon, 13 Jan 2025 18:00:00 +0000Cosmology https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3148199 After decades of study, scientists sound genuinely optimistic about the possibility of detecting primordial black holes, which might explain dark matter. 3148199
